data.name: RPG Maker MV - Heroine Character Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
No modern-day setting is complete without academia, and what better way to show off your schools than with a pack of spunky and sweet school girl characters?! Heroine Character Pack 1 contains 8 girl characters in uniform, as well as an extra clothing variation for each girl (including sports uniforms or casual outfits). Created by Gee-Kun Soft, each character is designed to fit a common story archetype - from the ambitious sports fan to the next-door sweetheart and more. But it's up to you to decide just what role they're going to play! With matching character sprites, battlers, SV battlers, facesets and portraits, you'll be able to choose if these heroines will be the party leaders or simply flesh out your world as NPCs.

Inspired by both a modern Japanese manga and anime aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources.

Features:
  • 8 characters with 2 outfit options each, for a total of 16 walking character sprites
  • 208 front-facing battlers (static, 13 variations per character)
  • 16 side-view battlers (animated)
  • 16 facesets, with 8 emotions each plus bonus variation expressions for 3 key characters
  • 134 portrait bust images (8 busts per character, with emotions and bonus expression for 3 characters)
  • BONUS: 16 pieces of large-scale full-character artwork and a preview of Fantasy Heroine 2 character pack (pugilist class portrait busts)

Heroine Character Pack 1 is a great match to modern guys in Parallel Worlds Character Pack.

data.short_description: No modern-day setting is complete without academia, and what better way to show off your schools than with a pack of spunky and sweet school girl characters?! Heroine Character Pack 1 contains 8 girl characters in uniform, as well as an extra clothing variation for each girl (including sports uniforms or casual outfits).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
